Package elki.database.query

Interface DistanceSimilarityQuery<O>

  • Type Parameters:
    O - Object type
    All Superinterfaces:
    DistanceQuery<O>, SimilarityQuery<O>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PrimitiveDistanceSimilarityQuery, SpatialPrimitiveDistanceSimilarityQuery
    public interface DistanceSimilarityQuery<O>
extends DistanceQuery<O>, SimilarityQuery<O>
    Interface that is a combination of distance and a similarity function. For combined implementations of both.
    Since:
    0.4.0
    Author:
    Erich Schubert

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface elki.database.query.distance.DistanceQuery

      • Methods inherited from interface elki.database.query.similarity.SimilarityQuery
